text:
Bread of kaya toast has become smaller now. Taste is nice. Got one with some black sesame.
Teh ice is very big but not very delicious

This morning, we enjoyed a delicious breakfast of Kaya Toast, with its perfect balance of sweetness and crunch. But what really stood out to me was the Teh ‚Äì rich, smooth, and unforgettable. The experience was so delightful, I‚Äôm already looking forward to coming back for more

Toast Box at Bugis Junction is a great spot for a classic breakfast or snack. Their kaya toast is fluffy and delicious, and the coffee is strong and aromatic. The staff is friendly and the place is always clean. However, I did find the prices to be a bit on the high side.
Yumm, i love their kaya toast with half boiled egg, and their coffee üòç perfect combo
Love Kaya Toast and Teh Tarik (hot milk tea) here. Great local dishes like Laksa and all assorted cakes. Good vibes. Traditional cafe restored and modernized.
